author: pkluegl
msg: Adapted all views of the addons project to CAS Editor. The CEV plugin should not be needed anymore. Overall functionality is tested, but some issues may still remain. Three strategies of the CEV plugins are converted to the new CAS Editor extension point.

msg: Use Args to check the passed data

author: jasha
msg: Explicitly set output encoding to UTF-8 (solves some encoding character issues between platforms)
